parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create new item and store it to soldier's vest. The item can also be a weapon or a magazine.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addItemToVest''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addItemToVest]] "itemGPS";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addItemToVest]] "hgun_Rook40_F";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeItemFromVest]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToUniform]]
</value></part></template></root>
